review: i bought this thing to watch youtube from my couch since i have a bad back..when i finally got it(took a month)and turned it on to explore,i quickly realized that to watch anything you have to  buy,buy,buy......even youtube is not free..who the heck wants to buy amazon coins to watch any show...i feel the advertising was misleading,and so now i am going to return it...
author: Derek Davis

review: The fire stick is a excellent choice for people who have netflix and amazon prime. The movies start up instantly and the menu's are easy to navigate through.It froze on me one time but all I had to do was take it out of the hdmi port and insert it again and everything was fine.
author: BMAN

review: This thing is awsome.  Super fast and easy to use.  I bought it to replace my chromecast and couldn't be happier.  The only problem I have now is what to do with the chromecast.
author: antonio reyes

review: Great streaming stick. Can be hacked to view free TV as well!
author: MCPRO "KBARNES"

review: It's much better than I expected
author: Quinton

review: This is great, can go on any TV with a USB.
author: Mark Sousa

review: Streams well.  Wish content was more for Prime members.  Really have to subscribe to other services to make this worth your while.
author: Greg
